data.eml:eml: An annotated checklist of Brazilian sea spiders (Arthropoda: Pycnogonida)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lucena, Rudá Amorim, Christoffersen, Martin Lindsey (2018): An annotated checklist of Brazilian sea spiders (Arthropoda: Pycnogonida). Zootaxa 4370 (2): 101-122, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4370.2.1
